String.Source: Something on your mind?
Something on your mind?
No.
Not every. More like every now and then. But always on a Sundas.
String.Dest: 并不是每一个。更像是每个现在与将来。但总是在周日。

String.Source: She comes on Sundas.
No.
Get lost.
Unless you want a drink, we're done.
String.Dest: 除非你要来一杯，我们之间，就到此为止吧。

String.Source: Uh-huh.
10 gold. You're out by morning, or else I throw you out.
String.Dest: 10个金币。而且你得在早上的时候滚出去，不然我就把你扔出去。

String.Source: Price is the same, rules are the same.
10 gold. No coin, no bed.
Nope.
How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: Not many people can find the place, to be honest, since it's not on any map.
String.Dest: 说实话，没多少人能找到这个地方。因为那里在任何一份地图上都没有标示。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: The only reason the guard were able to arrest my father is because he was forced to spend the night in Solitude.
String.Dest: 守卫逮捕我父亲唯一可行的理由就是他非自愿而不得不在独孤城过了一夜。

String.Source: No. I'm talking about my tongue.
Might as well. Can't tell the difference anyway.
String.Dest: Might as well. Can't tell the difference anyway.

String.Source: I'm done renovating the tavern for now.
String.Dest: 酒馆装修的事情我做完了。

String.Source: All right.
A male, if you don't mind.
Got it.
I prefer a female wench.
Got it.
I want to start selling skooma.
Bad idea. But you're the boss.
String.Dest: 这可不好，但是你说了算。

String.Source: I don't want to sell skooma anymore.
Smart.
We ought to sell Spiced Wine.
String.Dest: 我们应该出售浓香葡萄酒。

String.Source: Sure. It'll get the fancy types in here. Talk to Evette.
String.Dest: 当然。这儿能搞到些好的。和爱芙缇谈谈。

String.Source: I want to sell Black-Briar Mead.
Talk to Maven. She'll set you straight.
String.Dest: Talk to Maven. She'll set you straight.

String.Source: We should stick with what we currently sell.
String.Dest: 我们应该坚持我们现在所卖的东西。

String.Source: Good idea.
We need to hire a new wench. (500 Gold)
String.Dest: 我们正好要雇一个新女仆（500金币）

String.Source: Alright, I'll find one. Shouldn't be too hard.
String.Dest: 好吧我会去找一个。应该不会太难。

String.Source: I want to talk about the drink menu.
String.Dest: 我想聊聊菜单里有什么喝的。

String.Source: Sure thing.
Send out letters by courier announcing the opening of this place. (1000 Gold)
String.Dest: 通过快递发送信件来宣布这个地方开放了。 (1000 Gold)

String.Source: Not a problem. Just got a find a pen.
String.Dest: 没问题。只要找到一支笔。

String.Source: Hire a chef and import better ingredients and food stocks. (1500 Gold)
String.Dest: 雇一个厨师并采购更好的材料和食品。（1500金币）

String.Source: Will do.
What's it going to take to make this place respectable?
String.Dest: 现在要采取什么措施才能让这个地方看起来令人满意？

String.Source: Gold. Lots of gold.
I want to make some changes to the tavern.
String.Dest: 我想给那酒馆来点变化。

String.Source: Sure. You're the boss. What do you need?
String.Dest: 当然。你是老大。你需要点儿啥？

String.Source: I want to make some changes to the tavern.
String.Dest: 我想给那酒馆来点变化。

String.Source: Sure. You're the boss. What do you need?
String.Dest: 当然。你是老大。你需要点儿啥？

String.Source: What do you know about the black market trade here?
String.Dest: 关于这里的黑市贸易你都了解多少？

String.Source: Don't know nothing about nobody. Just pass the notes, serve the drinks, and say my lines.
String.Dest: 不知道小人物的任何事情。穿过音符，上着小酒，说着我的台词。

String.Source: What do you know about the black market trade here?
String.Dest: 关于这里的黑市贸易你都了解多少？

String.Source: You know, food for the hungry, drink for the thirsty. Warm ale and warm bosoms and all that.
String.Dest: 你懂你懂，饿了的话有吃的，渴了的话有喝的，暖暖的麦酒加上软软的胸部，这就是全部。

String.Source: What do you know about the black market trade here?
String.Dest: 关于这里的黑市贸易你都了解多少？

String.Source: Don't know nothing about nobody. Just pass the notes, serve the drinks, and say my lines.
String.Dest: 不知道小人物的任何事情。穿过音符，上着小酒，说着我的台词。

String.Source: What do you know about the black market trade here?
String.Dest: 关于这里的黑市贸易你都了解多少？

String.Source: You know, food for the hungry, drink for the thirsty. Warm ale and warm bosoms and all that.
String.Dest: 你懂你懂，饿了的话有吃的，渴了的话有喝的，暖暖的麦酒加上软软的胸部，这就是全部。

String.Source: How's business faring?
Made a profit. Here.
How's business faring?
Made a profit. Here.
How's business faring?
Made a profit. Here.
Good to know. One of my companions happens to be an old friend.
String.Dest: 真高兴，我的一个伙伴竟然是位老朋友。

String.Source: Didn't think she had any. Said she'd be waiting for one, up in Dawnstar. Probably there now.
String.Dest: 别认为她会有。她一直窝在晨星城等着某人。现在可能就在那里。

String.Source: Every Sundas?
Every Sundas?
No. Not every Sundas. But every now and then. Last I heard she was going to Dawnstar to meet an old friend. Didn't think she had any.
String.Dest: 不。不是每个星期天。而是时不时地就...最近的那次我听她说要去晨星见一个老朋友。我不觉得她在那会有老朋友。

String.Source: Do you know anything about a Redguard assassin?
String.Dest: 你知道有个红卫人刺客的事吗？

String.Source: Yeah. She comes in on Sundas.
Great. We got a real talker over here. Do us a favor and shut up.
String.Dest: 真不错。我们这儿有个真正的话痨。看我们面子把嘴闭上行吗？

String.Source: All right.
Did you hear the commotion outside? Your bandit friends died slowly.
String.Dest: 你听到外面的骚动了吗？你的强盗朋友们在慢慢的死去。

String.Source: Not a bandit. Just the barman.
String.Dest: 他不是个强盗，只是个酒保。

String.Source: My name is <Alias=Player> and I'm here to rescue you.
String.Dest: 我叫 <Alias=Player> 我是来救你的。

String.Source: Great.
Do you work at this tavern?
Yup.
Are you alright?
Are you alright?
Sure. Never better.
Yeah?
Care to elaborate?
There's a lot noise outside. Lot of ale. But here...here's quiet.
String.Dest: 外面太吵了。 杂言碎语没完没了。不过这里……这里真安静啊。

String.Source: I understand. You come here to relax and meditate.
String.Dest: 我明白了，你是为了放松和冥想才到这儿来的。

String.Source: Yeah. There's a lot noise outside. Lot of ale. But here...here's quiet.
String.Dest: 嗯，外面很吵。很多麦芽酒。但是这里……这里很安静。

String.Source: This is an odd way to spend your breaks.
String.Dest: 你休息的方式还真奇怪啊。

String.Source: Not to me.
You just come here and stare at the wall?
String.Dest: 你就只是单纯过来这里然后一直盯着一堵墙？

String.Source: Yup.
What are you doing in this room?
I'm on break.
I don't really have a joke.
String.Dest: 我并不是真要讲个笑话。

String.Source: Funny.
You're supposed to say "Who's there?" Don't you know anything?
String.Dest: 你这时候应该说“谁在那儿？”才对。你难道没背台词吗？

String.Source: Funny.
They end up torturing and killing the bartender.
String.Dest: 他们最终会折磨并杀掉那个酒保。

String.Source: Funny.
And they meet the dullest mortal in all of Tamriel.
String.Dest: 然后他们碰到了整个泰穆里尔大陆上最迟钝的凡人。

String.Source: Funny.
How about this joke? A bard, a knight, and a Dragonborn walk into a tavern...
String.Dest: 那这个笑话呢？一个吟游诗人，一个骑士，一个龙裔，一起走进一家小酒馆...

String.Source: Mm-hm.
Not a bad policy to have, when what you know can get you killed.
String.Dest: 当你所知道的东西会威胁到你的生命时，有个应对的对策总比没对策要好。

String.Source: Exactly.
You need better friends.
Agreed.
Agreed.
It's always prudent to listen to any rumor, regardless of how inconsequential.
String.Dest: 听取各种流言永远是精明的，不管是多么不合常理的版本。

String.Source: Good advice.
Good. I'm the only voice worth listening to anyway.
String.Dest: 很好。总之我的声音是唯一值得欣赏的。

String.Source: Don't care. A barkeep's heard too many bad stories, and too many bad jokes. He knows it's best not to listen to anyone.
String.Dest: 不用在意。一个酒吧老板的听到了太多的坏故事，太多不好的笑话。他知道最好别把什么事都当真。

String.Source: Which means you're a good listener.
String.Dest: 这表示你是个不错的倾听者。

String.Source: Nope. A barkeep's heard too many bad stories, and too many bad jokes. He knows it's best not to listen to anyone.
String.Dest: 不，一个酒保总会听到太多不好的故事，以及糟糕的笑话。他知道最好别把什么事都当真。

String.Source: You're a man of few words.
String.Dest: 你是一个少言寡语的人。

String.Source: That's what they say.
What have you got for sale?
Drinks. Food. Beds.
Sure. Why not.
All right, then.
Okay.
Okay.
Uh-huh.
Need something?
Something on your mind?
Something on your mind?
Hm?
